snippet: The British singer-songwriter Ed Sheeran was aggressively sincere in his set at the Mercury Lounge on Tuesday night.
abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews performance by singer and songwriter Ed Sheeran at the Mercury Lounge.
lead_paragraph: The British singer-songwriter Ed Sheeran was aggressively sincere in his set at the Mercury Lounge on Tuesday night.
